sense.name: Invade or occupy in large numbers or in great amount.
sense.examples: The roaches overran our kitchen. The Kudzu plant overruns more of the South each day. The Crusaders overran much of the Holy Land.

sense.name: Surpass a landmark or limit.
sense.commentary: Note: compare to sense 1, where the area filled is either geographical or political. Here is is a specific point in space or the confines of a container. Also, conquest is not involved.
sense.examples: The plane overran the runway. Water overran the edges of the glass.
